mapper.select: SELECT r.room_no, r.room_name, r.price_per_night, res.resid_name FROM residence_rooms r JOIN residence res ON r.resid_no = res.resid_no WHERE r.room_no NOT IN ( SELECT room_no FROM reservations WHERE (#{currentDate} >= checkin_date AND checkout_date > #{currentDate}) AND reservation_status != '예약 취소' ) AND res.host_user_no = #{hostUserNo} ORDER BY res.resid_name, r.room_name;

SELECT u.name AS guest_name, u.phone AS guest_phone, rr.room_name, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, r.reservation_status FROM reservations r JOIN residence_rooms rr ON r.room_no = rr.room_no JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no JOIN residence res ON rr.resid_no = res.resid_no WHERE res.resid_no = #{hotelId} AND #{currentDate} >= r.checkin_date AND r.checkout_date >= #{currentDate} AND r.reservation_status = '예약 완료';
